metadata.title: CVE-2018-7455 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - negligible
metadata.description:
An out-of-bounds read in JPXStream::readTilePart in JPXStream.cc in xpdf4.00 allows attackers to launch denial of service via a specific pdf file,as demonstrated by pdftohtml.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7455` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.62.0-1ubuntu1
libpoppler-cpp0v5 - 0.62.0-1ubuntu1
libpoppler-glib8 - 0.62.0-1ubuntu1
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 0.62.0-1ubuntu1
libpoppler-qt6-3 - 0.62.0-1ubuntu1
libpoppler130 - 0.62.0-1ubuntu1
poppler-utils - 0.62.0-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xpdf package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
poppler package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.62.0-1ubuntu1').
ipe package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
